scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.build.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_OPTIONS="--conditions=source" node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r reflect-metadata src/integration/trading-engine.test.ts
scripts.test:trading-engine: NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.build.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_OPTIONS="--conditions=source" node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r reflect-metadata src/integration/trading-engine.test.ts
scripts.test:db:order-association: NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.build.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_OPTIONS="--conditions=source" node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r reflect-metadata src/unit/database/order-strategy-association.test.ts
scripts.test:all-ws: npm run test:binance && npm run test:okx && npm run test:coinbase
scripts.test:all-rest: npm run test:binance-rest && npm run test:okx-rest && npm run test:coinbase-rest
scripts.test:all-exchanges: npm run test:all-ws && npm run test:all-rest
scripts.test:all-integration: npm run test:trading-engine && npm run test:strategy-execution && npm run test:subscription
scripts.test:all: npm run test:all-exchanges && npm run test:all-integration && npm run test:db:order-association
scripts.tool:init-history: NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.build.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_OPTIONS="--conditions=source" node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r reflect-metadata src/tools/init-history.ts
scripts.cron: NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.build.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_OPTIONS="--conditions=source" node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r reflect-metadata src/tools/cron.ts
